document_data.name: Transmute Water to Dust
document_data.level2e: {{spell table|edition=2e|[[Arcanist]]|6|[[Druid]]|6|[[Elemental sphere|Elemental]]|6|[[Elemental earth sphere|Elemental Earth]]|6|[[Elemental water sphere|Elemental Water]]|6|[[Wizard]]|6}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Transmute water to dust''''' was an [[alteration]] spell that turned all the water in the target area to dust. The reverse of this spell, '''''improved create water''''', converted a volume of dust or dirt into pure water.
document_data.History:
The [[Arcane magic|arcane]] version of this spell was developed by [[Netheril|Netherese]] [[arcanist]] [[Proctiv]] in {{Yearlink|-2063}} under the name '''''Proctiv's water-dust transmutation'''''.<ref>

{{stub}}
